thread.section_title: Hotel Stendhal Place Vendome Paris - MGallery Collection - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great value and excellent staff
thread.title_full: Great value and excellent staff - Review of Hotel Stendhal Place Vendome Paris - MGallery Collection, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: andrewandvirginiac
title: Great value and excellent staff
text: The rooms are of a reasonable size and appear to have been recently remodeled. This hotel offers great value for money given its prime location.Most importantly, the staff are exceptionally committed to client service. Friendly and efficient, they go out of their way to be helpful. It was a pleasure to stay there.
